storyInfo: Ela leads her squad into Magnethill No. 2 again to investigate the disappearance of Ash and the others. Not only do they find key clues, they also happen to foil a kidnapping.

attributes.content: We've arrived at Magnethill No. 2. Repeat, we've arrived at Magnethill No. 2.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Doc, how are things over on your side?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Exterior clear.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Considering the unique properties of Magnethill No. 2, I suggest we meet up.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Agreed.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Drone recon report, Iana.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Almost no different from the way we left it. Readings are virtually the same, and there is no sign of activity from any other party.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Looks like the quarantine on Magnethill No. 2 has been pretty well enforced.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Which is to say, there's nobody here.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: And that's not good news, because we're here to look for the missing Ash squad.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Keep your eyes open. We'll proceed to Levi's main lab once we rendezvous.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Here we are.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: This is where Levi's main lab was, according to the map.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: We were only one step behind Cohen. There were tremors, then...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I don't know if it was that madman Levi, or something wrong with the equipment, but the whole lab disappeared into thin air.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Into thin air? Are you sure?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I'd say that in my expert opinion, it's the most fitting description of the events.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: That just doesn't seem possible.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: No explosion can wipe out all evidence that a lab ever existed. It wouldn't have left a big hole like this, sending only a few tremors through those outside.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Earthquake? Or is it like you said...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: It's not an earthquake!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The tremors might well be linked to the disappearance.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Find cover and wait for the tremors to pass!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: How many floors are there? My legs are starting to scream.
attributes.name: Grumbling Soldier

attributes.content: Keep going up, we need to reach the Reynell's penthouse.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Can't we take the elevator? Why do we have to climb these stairs floor by floor?
attributes.name: Grumbling Soldier

attributes.content: You think I don't want to?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Recon report on the security here indicates that the penthouse is only accessible by these stairs and his own private elevator.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: There are guards posted by the elevator on every floor.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Security is weakest on the stairs, that's where we break through.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Guy's just a Kazimierzian who came to make some money, isn't he? It's not like he has anybody backing him up. Why do we have to be so careful just to get him to sign a transfer agreement?
attributes.name: Grumbling Soldier

attributes.content: He has money. That's all the backing he needs.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Keep moving. Quit looking around!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: I'm completely spent, boss... I'd rather take the lift and fight my way through.
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: Shh...
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Captain?
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: (Whisper) We've almost reached the office! Quiet down..
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: A letter? I told you, you can open those on your own. No need to ask me.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: It says for your eyes only, Reynell.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Where is it from?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Kazimierz... looks like it's from your uncle.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Ah, the usual inheritance demand.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Also... one from the Dossoles municipal government.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: A letter from the city? Probably nothing important. Should be another stupid banquet invitation.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Maybe Candela will be there. We could discuss the opening ceremony with her. It's not far off, after all, and you've spent so much time and effort on it...
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: It's probably going to be spectacular.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Come, stand with me, Miłosz.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: The man walks up and stands by the red-haired Vulpo's side.
They admire the artwork at the end of the room, about the height of two persons.
I'm naming it 'The Fall of Order'. What do you think?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Er... sure. You want to show it at the opening?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: We've always been straight with each other, haven't we?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Is that twisted curve intended to represent the 'fall'?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: No, it represents the fleeting gaze of society on man.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: A dogmatic gaze that considers all that does not conform to be madness. Lines that can only emerge from a post-Profound Silence Iberia.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: The Iberian Inquisition. Certainly a symbol of order.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: On the right... does that indescribable cone represent the spires of Leithanien?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: No. Imagine Sargon and its millennia of wind and sand, the lords ameer, the Padishah, the golden city... fantasizing the exotic is also a construct of internal order.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: The last gasp of imagination, once broad, now left with nothing but cliche.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Yes... Right, that makes sense.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: I pulled all of that directly out of my behind.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Your artistic style has always been unique, from medium to expression.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: How many golf balls did it take? A thousand? Two thousand?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: That's not important. What's important is the last one. Would you do me a favor and put the finishing touch on it, by placing this one on top?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: What would happen?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: It will be completed, and at that moment—
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: He sees shadows flash past the bottom gap of the office door.
The door is kicked open before he could react. The whole room trembles, causing the teetering sculpture before him to collapse, sending golf balls flying everywhere.
...'The Fall'?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Reynell and you, secretary over there. Hands on your heads and get down. No sudden moves.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Doesn't matter. You and your boss are going to come quietly, if you know what's good for you.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Something is approaching rapidly from above.
Must be a particularly big fowlbeast, the officer thought. He pays no heed to it and points his crossbow at Reynell, the half-collapsed golf ball sculpture standing between them.
Then, he hears a loud noise from the ceiling, right above what remains of the sculpture.
Then another.
This time, a large hole appears in the ceiling, along with the sound of broken planks.
Several dark shadows fall through the shrapnel-mixed dust onto the floor of Reynell's office, smashing what remained of the sculpture, sending golf balls flying in all directions.
The soldier was about to let out an expletive, but it died in his throat.
The shadows began to move.
Everybody alright?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Just a little scrape.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Doc?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I... I'm okay.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Iana gives Doc a hand and sees he is holding a golf ball, which left a round mark on his forehead.
I'm fine... other than a little knock from a golf ball.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Next question.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Anyone know what happened, other than that we somehow fell into a pile of golf balls?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Why didn't we go just in through the roof? We wouldn't have had to climb the stairs if we did that.
attributes.name: Bewildered Soldier

attributes.content: Shut up. Prepare to engage!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: A crossbow?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: ...Prepare to engage.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I guess you aren't exactly friends.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Did you bring a weapon, Miłosz?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: (Shrugs) Nope.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Well, in that case...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: You'd better duke it out amongst yourselves to decide who gets to kidnap me. There's only one of me, after all.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: A drink, Miłosz?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Pass. I still have to protect you.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Kidnap?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: A furry kidnapping party? That's new.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Enough chit-chat! Drop your weapons and get away from Reynell, or we'll shoot!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Well, they're coming for us, kidnappers or not.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Find cover!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Iana, Doc, take the non-combatants and get out of here! Fuze and I will cover you!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No Sankta halos, and they don't look like Blacksteel either...
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Do these idiots have a death wish? They just think guns look cool?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Move! Don't let them get away with Reynell!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: On your ten, Iana!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Hostile down!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Those guns aren't just for looks!
attributes.name: Alert Soldier

attributes.content: Stand your ground! We have backup!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Reserve squad! Quit fooling around and get out here!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: I can't get to the non-combatants! There are too many of them. Iana and I are suppressed—
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Reloading!
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I'm up!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Frag out!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Ineffective! Hostiles are blast resistant!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Roger. Fuze, smoke.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Smoke grenade out.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Smoke won't solve the real problem. Need a Cluster Charge? I still have plenty.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: That's one way, but Grzmot works better here.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Iana, Doc, get those non-combatants to cover! Fuze and I will cover!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Firing!
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Stay back!
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Don't resist! I'm taking you to cover!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Why do we have to—
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Look out!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: A sneak attack?!
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Looks like you're more than just a secretary!
attributes.name: Alert Soldier

attributes.content: You talk too much.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Get back, sir! You're in the line of fi—
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Trying to fight real weapons with a wine bottle? Dumbass—
attributes.name: Alert Soldier

attributes.content: Very immature.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: He's out cold. I'll carry him. You get that guy in white.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: They're trying to take Reynell away! Stop them!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: We can't get close! Their guns fire too quickly!
attributes.name: Slick Soldier

attributes.content: Dammit, what the hell are you doing when they're not firing!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: They keep finding dead zones! And their coordination—
attributes.name: Slick Soldier

attributes.content: There are only four of them! How many guys do we have?!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: We're in cover! We can hold out for a while!
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Reloading!
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: That guy's out! Get him!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Iana, smoke!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Smoke grenade out!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Another smoke grenade? Is that the best you can—
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Flying out.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: ...Sticking it.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Here's a memento.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Get out of the way, Fuze!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: The other two are trying to hide!
attributes.name: Slick Soldier

attributes.content: Surround them and—
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: They swarmed without any caution for possible explosives. No tactical awareness whatsoever.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Let's disarm them first. Tend to the wounded, Doc.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Clear.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Clear.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Clear.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: All clear. No casualties. That's good news.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Even though we were shooting to incapacitate rather than kill, these guys were still unusually tough. That one there survived a full shotgun blast at point-blank range.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Good news indeed.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: One more thing. Not sure what it means, but look at the animal ears... you can see blood vessels, if you look closely.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Is that part of Levi's research too?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: My compass isn't working. What about yours, Doc?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: If we're really near Magnethill No. 2 in the Southern Urals...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Doc looks behind him, where the wind is blowing the curtains open.
The squad walks out to the balcony and takes in the sight outside.
The setting sun shines down between towering skyscrapers, painting the waters red.
Tourists in swimsuits lie on the beach, enjoying a lazy holiday afternoon set to ice cream truck music.
The only man in the room who can still stand slowly walks towards them.
If this is the Urals, then I'm George Clooney.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: It's clear we're no longer in the mission area.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Did we teleport?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Where to? The Maldives?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It looks like a vacation spot alright... but I don't think it's the Maldives.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Maybe we can ask the unfortunate victims—Oh, speak of the devil.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Could you answer a few questions, sir? Who are you? What is this place? And who were those armed men?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I'm happy to explain a few things, out of 'gratitude' for the surprising ending that you created for my work.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Before formal introductions, however, I must correct one premise... I was never an unfortunate victim.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Not before, not now, not ever.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Can we get back on topic?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Very well. Welcome to the dark heart of Bolívar...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Welcome to Dossoles.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: My name is Reynell Kowalski.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Call me Ela, Mr. Reynell.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: But, given that we need to quickly grasp our situation, I think we can cut the introductions. I'll ask, and you'll answer. Alright?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Doesn't look like I have a choice.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Which country does Dossoles belong to?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Bolívar. In name, at least.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Bolívar... You mean Bolivia? I don't know a city called Dossoles in Bolivia. What about you, Iana?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Let's try another way. Which continent are we on? South America?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Continent? I'm not sure what you mean. If you mean the name of our 'landmass,' that's Terra, obviously?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Gówno......
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Kazimierzian) Oh? It's not every day I hear my mother tongue spoken.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Your mother tongue?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Nothing. Keep going.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I never thought I would be asking this, but...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Mr. Reynell, are we on Planet Earth?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Planet...? Earth...? I thought all I had to do was answer questions, but now I'm beginning to have a few of my own.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Iana, maybe you can do better with the questions...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Iana?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Iana does not answer.
Her eyes are wide, staring at the horizon in the opposite direction of the setting sun.
The others follow her gaze.
Two moons are rising slowly in the distance, one brighter than the other.
Damn, only had time for one doodle before they found out.
attributes.name: Strangely-Dressed Durin

attributes.content: That was close... gave me a fright when all those people showed up.
attributes.name: Strangely-Dressed Durin

attributes.content: Hold it right there, girl! You won't get away with vandalizing the Galería!
attributes.name: Galería Security

attributes.content: Shoot. I'd better go.
attributes.name: Strangely-Dressed Durin

attributes.content: You got lucky today... Reynell.
attributes.name: Strangely-Dressed Durin
